content.rendered:
The Punto Curved Armchair is constructed from a rubber wood frame, the most ecologically friendly timber, which is then stained to mahogany. 

This chair is finished in a hard-wearing dark brown coloured faux-leather and a generously deep cushioned seat and back.

Suitable for all types of commercial venue.
